channel.title: Cal Poly Tip on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Cal Poly Tip on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Cal Poly Pro Tip: Shortcut
item.description: In the UU Plaza and need to get to Baker? Cut straight through Building 52 (Science) which is right across from Lucyâ€™s and Poly Deli! It saves a lot of walking time and eliminates the hills!

item.title: Cal Poly Pro Tip: Lost Items
item.description: If you lose a personal item somewhere on campus, you can go to https://afd.calpoly.edu/facilities/services/lost-and-found and file a lost item report. If they do not have your item, seek out the head of whichever building you lost the item in. For example, if you lost an item in our Statistics classroom (Room 123A of building 38), you go to the ethics department office located south of our classroom on the first floor.

item.title: Cal Poly Pro Tip: Waffles
item.description: At 805 Kitchen, to spice up your waffle, grab toppings from the yogurt bar (chocolate chips, coconut flakes, etc) and add it into your waffle batter before cooking your waffle!
